text: Svatopluk Karásek (18 October 1942 - 20 December 2020) was a Czech politician, Evangelical priest and activist. He was born in Prague. He was known as a signer of the Charter 77. He was a member of the Freedom Union – Democratic Union. Karásek was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2002 to 2006. Karásek died in Prague on 20 December 2020 at the age of 78.Zemřel písničkář a duchovní Svatopluk Karásek.
